message:
Egyptian Geeks group is made to share knowledge, experience even Geeks jokes can posted or shared between all our members.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Who can join this group:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Software Engineers
- UX / UI Designers
- Business Analysts

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Things we would like to avoid in our Group:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
one of the main reason that we keep our group growing is our NON-SPAM contents, helpful topics, sharing problems and solutions and YOUR Participations :) . We will appreciate your help in keeping this group SPAM FREE and into the point. such as "Ads, Non-Free Courses, etc..."

EGYPTIAN GEEKS
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din updated the description of the group Egyptian Geeks.

data.message:
i am a web developer, and i find the list of "Who can join" offensive :(
jk tb3n bas el list dy na2sa ;)

Mahmoud Tantawy who can Join "Software Engineers" which refers to web developers/software developers ;) if you have something to add or need t change in the group description tell me and i will do it :) we are very flexible ;)

لو ممكن كمان نضيف ناس بتوع  Security وNetwork 
ولا كدا بنبعد عن الهدف بتاع الجروب
Mohamed Alaa nop, that's good enough, and thumbs up for the strict spam policy

Mahmoud Tantawy ya basha la shokr 3ala wageb, we just want the group a good place to hang out together or organize meetings we manla2eesh el group ba2et zai el waseet we tla2y ba2a 3agala lel bee3 :D we wa7ed ba3et le 7abebto dabadeeb el kalam dah LOL :D
